doc.field: Includes a photo of HRL with Major General C. E. Combs and Dr. Novice G. Fawcett being briefed on a visit to the Air Force Institute of Technology (AFIT) and other group shots with HRL's during the same visit; HRL at George Hunt's LIFE dinner showing something to a group of musicians; HRL with Madeleine Richards and Ed Warner at a TIME staff dinner; contact sheet with portraits of HRL; group shot with HRL at TIME's businessman's tour of Eastern Europe; HRL receiving an award at the Syracuse University School of Journalism; HRL with Thanat Khoman at the Foreign Policy Association luncheon; HRL at the Paul Hoffman dinner; HRL with General Milton G. Baker reviewing the corps of Valley Forge Military Academy; negatives of the TIME staff party (hunt ball) by Martha Holmes; HRL with Blagoje Lazic, Deputy Editor-in-Chief- of Yugoslav newspaper Borba; various photos of HRL with Josip Broz Tito; various photos of HRL at the 50 Million Fund for the Presbyterian Church dinner; HRL with Alfred Eisenstaedt; group shot with HRL in cap and gown after receiving an honorary doctorate at Yale; HRL at the dedication of the Severinghaus Library at the Heverford School; HRL at the Boeing's 50th anniversary party; and original signed letters from John Marin with an enclosed colored group shot with HRL.
